      • createTempDir

        @NotNull
public static URI createTempDir(@NotNull
                        String dirName)
                         throws IOException
        If given file does not exist relative to OS temp dir then creates it and returns URL to it and if it already exists then URL to it will be returned.
        Parameters:
        dirName - - dir to be created relative to OS temp dir
        Returns:
        URL to created dir
        Throws:
        IOException
